languages.text: Амулет, принадлежавший стойко противостоявшему ужасам варпа астропату. Прежний владелец встретил ужасный конец, но его несгибаемая воля продолжает жить в этой ледяной на ощупь реликвии.

This amulet is painfully cold to the touch. It once belonged to an Astropath who stood strong against the horrors of the warp. Though its former owner met a terrible end, his unbending will lives on in this relic.
languages.original_text: Амулет, принадлежавший стойко противостоявшему ужасам варпа астропату. Прежний владелец встретил ужасный конец, но его несгибаемая воля продолжает жить в этой ледяной на ощупь реликвии.

languages.text: Este amuleto es tan frío que duele al contacto. Perteneció a un Astrópata que se mantuvo firme ante los horrores de la disformidad. A pesar de que su antiguo dueño sufrió una muerte espantosa, su voluntad inquebrantable se conserva en esta reliquia.
languages.original_text: This amulet is painfully cold to the touch. It once belonged to an Astropath who stood strong against the horrors of the warp. Though its former owner met a terrible end, his unbending will lives on in this relic.

traits.locale_text: Este amuleto es tan frío que duele al contacto. Perteneció a un Astrópata que se mantuvo firme ante los horrores de la disformidad. A pesar de que su antiguo dueño sufrió una muerte espantosa, su voluntad inquebrantable se conserva en esta reliquia.

languages.text: このお守りは冷たく、触れると痛いほどだ。かつて<歪み>の恐怖に立ち向かった感応通信官のものだった。前の持ち主はひどい最期を遂げたが、彼の曲げぬ意志はこの中に生き続けている。
languages.original_text: This amulet is painfully cold to the touch. It once belonged to an Astropath who stood strong against the horrors of the warp. Though its former owner met a terrible end, his unbending will lives on in this relic.

traits.locale_text: このお守りは冷たく、触れると痛いほどだ。かつて<歪み>の恐怖に立ち向かった感応通信官のものだった。前の持ち主はひどい最期を遂げたが、彼の曲げぬ意志はこの中に生き続けている。

languages.text: 光是触碰这枚护身符，你的手指就会被冻得发疼。这枚护身符原本的主人是位星语者，曾顽强地抵抗着来自亚空间的恐怖之物。尽管那位星语者遭遇了可怕的结局，但他不屈不挠的意志将在这件遗物中长存。
languages.original_text: This amulet is painfully cold to the touch. It once belonged to an Astropath who stood strong against the horrors of the warp. Though its former owner met a terrible end, his unbending will lives on in this relic.

traits.locale_text: 光是触碰这枚护身符，你的手指就会被冻得发疼。这枚护身符原本的主人是位星语者，曾顽强地抵抗着来自亚空间的恐怖之物。尽管那位星语者遭遇了可怕的结局，但他不屈不挠的意志将在这件遗物中长存。

languages.text: Das Amulett fühlt sich schmerzhaft kalt an. Es gehörte einst einem Astropathen, der sich gegen die Schrecken des Warp stellte. Obwohl der frühere Besitzer einen schrecklichen Tod starb, erfüllt sein unbeugsamer Wille das Relikt noch immer.
languages.original_text: This amulet is painfully cold to the touch. It once belonged to an Astropath who stood strong against the horrors of the warp. Though its former owner met a terrible end, his unbending will lives on in this relic.

traits.locale_text: Das Amulett fühlt sich schmerzhaft kalt an. Es gehörte einst einem Astropathen, der sich gegen die Schrecken des Warp stellte. Obwohl der frühere Besitzer einen schrecklichen Tod starb, erfüllt sein unbeugsamer Wille das Relikt noch immer.

languages.text: Cette amulette est douloureusement froide au toucher. Elle appartenait autrefois à un astropathe ayant bravé les horreurs du Warp. Si son précédent propriétaire a connu une fin atroce, sa volonté inébranlable survit à travers cette relique.
languages.original_text: This amulet is painfully cold to the touch. It once belonged to an Astropath who stood strong against the horrors of the warp. Though its former owner met a terrible end, his unbending will lives on in this relic.

traits.locale_text: Cette amulette est douloureusement froide au toucher. Elle appartenait autrefois à un astropathe ayant bravé les horreurs du Warp. Si son précédent propriétaire a connu une fin atroce, sa volonté inébranlable survit à travers cette relique.

languages.text: Bu uğurluk, dokununca acı verecek derecede soğuk. Bir vakitler öteboyutun dehşetleri karşısında dimdik durmuş bir Astropat'a aitti. Önceki sahibi feci bir şekilde can verse de sahibinin boyun eğmeyen iradesi hâlâ bu yadigârda yaşar.
languages.original_text: This amulet is painfully cold to the touch. It once belonged to an Astropath who stood strong against the horrors of the warp. Though its former owner met a terrible end, his unbending will lives on in this relic.
